name: Emoji Arena Royale
description:
Do you like emojis? Do you ever have a need to have something on your screen to look like you are actually doing something? Do you want something super simple and not that complex? Great! This could very possibly most likely be for you!

Very simple game that is best described as an auto-battler.

Made with Godot 4 beta 4, also my first project on Godot as a whole.
